Text:
CanadaJoe- I've been on a hunt lately for some good old country-rock tracks, and I have seen your name on QUITE A FEW torrents... Jayhawks, Uncle Tupelo, etc... I'm about to search for some Old 97's, and I have no doubt there'll be a torrent of them here with your name on it.

BIG THANKS for all your work, man!
